scripts.test: forge clean && forge build && forge test --ffi
scripts.coverage: forge coverage --report lcov --ffi && genhtml lcov.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage
scripts.deploy_CatalogFactory: forge clean && forge build && forge script script/DeployCatalogFactory.s.sol:DeployCatalogFactory --rpc-url rpcUrl --broadcast --verify -vvvv --ffi
